attributes.additional_details:
I want the government to look at the effects of high prices on gas and electricity and  to work with the 6 companies to come up with possible ways to solve a hike in prices because families are suffering the cold and can effect the health of families especially little children.
I think the government should consider
cap on the percentage companies can put prices up
the effects on families
strict regulations on what energy and gas companies can  and can not do
fine companies for breaking the cap and a compensation fund for families who are being ripped off.
